mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT (CH_NO, CH_MESSAGE, CH_SENDER, CH_TARGET) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(CH_NO)+1, '1') FROM CHAT), #{ch_message}, #{ch_sender}, #{ch_target})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, e1.EMPL_NAME sender_name, e2.EMPL_NAME target_name, e1.EMPL_PICTURE AS SENDER_PIC FROM CHAT c JOIN EMPLOYEE e1 ON c.CH_SENDER = e1.EMPL_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE e2 ON c.CH_TARGET = e2.EMPL_ID WHERE (CH_SENDER = #{ch_sender} AND CH_TARGET = #{ch_target}) OR (CH_SENDER = #{ch_target} AND CH_TARGET = #{ch_sender}) ORDER BY c.CH_DATE

SELECT CH_NO, CH_MESSAGE, CH_SENDER, sub.EMPL_NAME, DEPT_NAME , RANK_NAME , sub.EMPL_EMAIL, CH_TARGET, CH_DATE, CH_SET, EMPL_PICTURE AS SENDER_PIC , SORT FROM ( SELECT CH_NO, CH_MESSAGE, CH_SENDER, EMPL_EMAIL, CH_TARGET, CH_DATE, CH_SET, EMPL_PICTURE, EMPL_NAME, c1.COCO_NAME AS DEPT_NAME , c2.COCO_NAME AS RANK_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CH_SENDER ORDER BY CH_DATE DESC) AS rn, 1 SORT FROM CHAT INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON CH_SENDER = EMPL_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE c1 ON e.EMPL_DEPT_CD = c1.COCO_CD INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE c2 ON e.EMPL_RANK_CD = c2.COCO_CD WHERE CH_TARGET = #{ch_target} OR CH_SENDER = #{ch_target} ) sub WHERE rn = 1 UNION ALL SELECT CH_NO, CH_MESSAGE, CH_SENDER, EMPL_NAME, cc.COCO_NAME AS DEPT_NAME , cc2.COCO_NAME AS RANK_NAME , EMPL_EMAIL, CH_TARGET, NVL(CH_DATE, '2020-12-12'), CH_SET, EMPL_PICTURE, 2 SORT FROM EMPLOYEE e INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE cc ON e.EMPL_DEPT_CD = cc.COCO_CD INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE cc2 ON e.EMPL_RANK_CD = cc2.COCO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN CHAT c ON e.EMPL_ID = c.CH_SENDER AND c.CH_TARGET = #{ch_target} WHERE c.CH_SENDER IS NULL AND e.EMPL_ID != #{ch_target} ORDER BY SORT, CH_DATE DESC
